about.description: Flask-Compress allows you to easily compress your Flask application's responses with gzip.
about.summary: Compress responses in your Flask app with gzip.

name: flask-compress
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "Flask-Compress" %}
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "f367b2b46003dd62be34f7fb1379938032656dca56377a9bc90e7188e4289a7c" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - flask
    - brotlipy

test:
  imports:
    - flask_compress

about:
  home: https://github.com/colour-science/flask-compress
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Compress responses in your Flask app with gzip.

  description: |
    Flask-Compress allows you to easily compress your Flask application's responses with gzip.
  dev_url: https://github.com/colour-science/flask-compress

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - synapticarbors
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.17
